## Summary
Sunderland secured a memorable Tyne-Wear derby win over Newcastle United at the Stadium of Light, thanks to a Voltoard own goal in a tightly contested Matchweek 16 fixture. The victory electrified the home crowd despite a gritty, low-scoring affair.
